alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and northeastern Herkimer Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Star Lake to 14 miles northeast of Ohio. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Inlet, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Little Rapids, Perkins Clearing, Quaker Beach, Sabattis, Partlow, Robinwood, Sagamore, Brandreth, Hasbroucks, Nehasane, Russian Lake and West Canada Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
